channel.title: Process() Help
channel.description: [size=14pt]hello well i am trying to start a brand new server and i am adding dice to it. but i cant figure out where to add process() "FetchDice();" where does that go?[/size] [img]http://i935.photobucket.com/albums/ad199/Nuke-it-louder/error.png[/img]

item.title: Process() Help
item.dc:creator: @rova0 rova0
item.description:
@rova0 wrote:

That is taken from a dicing tutorial. As it isn’t from this website I am unable to provide a direct link, all I can do is point you in the right direction: go to Google.com, type in “[pi] 99% dicing” and then select the first search result. It is a full guide to the system you are currently adding.

Read full topic

item.title: Process() Help
item.dc:creator: @PvP_Bobby PvP Bobby
item.description:
@PvP_Bobby wrote:

ravekitty:

Anywhere in process is fine. Just go ahead and add it directly under process()

The error is “cannot find symbol,” how can you suggest that he adds that function in the process() function when he doesn’t even have it? Lol

Read full topic

item.title: Process() Help
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

Anywhere in process is fine. Just go ahead and add it directly under process()

Read full topic

item.title: Process() Help
item.dc:creator: @PvP_Bobby PvP Bobby
item.description:
@PvP_Bobby wrote:

What exactly does FetchDice() do? If it doesn’t do something on every single server tick. Why would you want it in process()? If it handles the dicing as soon as you click on the dice bag or whatever you do it initiate “dicing” why not do just that. On button click or item click or whatever do the dicing procedure. Otherwise, with the very little information and the convoluted question I have no idea how to help you with it.

Do you have any programming experience with Java or any other programming language for that matter?

Read full topic

item.title: Process() Help
item.dc:creator: @DarkSuch DarkSuch
item.description:
@DarkSuch wrote:

Where would i place it?

Read full topic

item.title: Process() Help
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

The method process() in most private servers is typically a loop that is repeated every server tick (~600 ms depending on lag). Your base should come with some sort of loop similar to process(), or an event system.

Read full topic
